sub_topic: Determining the length of a side in an isosceles triangle.
message_1: In an isosceles triangle, if the length of the base and one of the legs are 6 cm and 8 cm respectively, what is the length of the other leg?
message_2: In an isosceles triangle, the two legs are equal in length. Since one of the legs is given as 8 cm, the other leg will also be 8 cm in length.
